page.title: 05HARESFIELD:CHURCH & LIFE - 1
page.content: The St.Peter's Church and churchyard is well looked after. There is an interesting effigy of a man and woman in the church. In the churchyard one of the tombs displays a skeleton. The mount shown on the O.S. map is no longer there but adjacent to the churchyard is a large stagnant pool. There are 33 members on the electoral roll. Many people interviewed complained about the high cost of living. Most of the older inhabitants like the more modern conveniences such as central heating. The general feeling of the dairy farmers is the worrying time they are now experiencing. Having been encouraged by the EEC to build up their herds, they are now being told to cut down. Those people who have farmed for many years have seen many changes in the lifestyles of the population.
